statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE gender = 'male' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, preferences FROM users WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'female';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC, age DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT username, gender, preferences FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender, preferences FROM users WHERE age < 25 OR gender = 'Non-binary' ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE preferences->>'theme' = 'dark' ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, genre_preferences FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences INNER JOIN recommendations ON user_preferences.user_id = recommendations.user_id;
SELECT user_id, genre_preferences, language_preferences FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT language_preferences FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 3 AND recommendation_text LIKE '%action%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT user_id, product_id, rating FROM user_preferences ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_name, category FROM users JOIN products ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id AND products.product_id = user_preferences.product_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT username, product_name, rating FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, category FROM users JOIN products ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM items ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT item_name, category FROM items WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age < 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT users.username, preferences.category, items.item_name FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id JOIN preferences ON user_preferences.pref_id = preferences.pref_id JOIN items ON preferences.category = items.category;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM items WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT u.username, p.category, p.value FROM users u INNER JOIN preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.age > 30;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences JOIN preferences ON user_preferences.preference_id = preferences.preference_id WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT user_id, category FROM preferences WHERE value > 50;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT u.username, p.category, i.name, ip.preference_id FROM users u JOIN preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN item_preferences ip ON p.preference_id = ip.preference_id JOIN items i ON ip.item_id = i.item_id WHERE u.age >= 25 AND p.category = 'Food' ORDER BY u.username ASC, i.price DESC;
